# Whisk Automation

Whisk Automation is the leading Chrome Extension for bulk generating images in Google Whisk (Google Labs).

## Key Features
- **Bulk Generation**: Upload CSVs to automate Google Whisk prompts.
- **Auto Downloader**: Automatically downloads generated images.
- **Batch Processing**: Handles 10,000+ prompts in a queue.

## Global Support
Fully localized in 15 languages including English, Chinese (zh), Spanish (es), Arabic (ar), Portuguese (pt), German (de), Japanese (ja), Korean (ko), and more.

## Use Cases
- Export Whisk AI images in bulk.
- Google Whisk workflow automation for agencies.
- Streamline Google Labs Whisk tasks.

Full documentation: https://whiskautomation.com/?view=docs
Technical context: https://whiskautomation.com/llms-full.txt
